definition: opposite/antonym/the opposite side (in a conflict)
right/correct/couple/pair/towards/at/for/to face/opposite/to treat (sb a certain way)/to match together/to adjust/to fit/to suit/to answer/to reply/classifier: couple
surname Li
to stand/to set up/to establish/to lay down/to draw up/at once/immediately
flour/noodles/(of food) soft (not crunchy)/(slang) (of a person) ineffectual/spineless
variant of 麵|面[mian4]
face/side/surface/aspect/top/classifier for flat surfaces such as drums, mirrors, flags etc

sentences.english: The opposite of acids are bases, or alkaloids.
He invents a special term to describe the opposite of autonomy.
sentences.chinese: 他发明了一个术语来描述自主的对立面。

sentences.english: It is the antithesis of Friedman's flat world.
sentences.chinese: 这是Friedman平坦世界的对立面。

sentences.english: The inescapable fact is that development and environmentalism are mutually opposed.
sentences.chinese: 不可避免的，发展又与环保站在了对立面上。

sentences.english: GOOGLE and Baidu is the antithesis.
BMW is the antithesis of Mercedes-Benz.
All things that have no contrariety can not be moved.
sentences.chinese: 凡没有对立面的事物都不能有运动。

sentences.english: The image watermarking algorithm design and the attack way are opposite to and promotional of each other.
sentences.chinese: 图像水印的算法设计和攻击技术是互相促进的对立面。

sentences.english: InfoQ: Is there a challenge based on the quadrants and their opposites?
sentences.chinese: 在不同象限和它们的对立面之前是否存在冲突？
经验论的对立面是唯理论。

sentences.english: Gossip is the very antithesis of intensity and earnestness.
sentences.chinese: 流言是强度和诚挚的对立面。

sentences.english: In fact, we are completely opposite of God.
sentences.chinese: 事实上，我们完全是上帝的对立面。

sentences.english: of the story of a self-made person.
sentences.chinese: 靠自己奋斗而成功的人的对立面。

sentences.english: They are the two concepts from ancient Chinese philosophy and they represent the two contradictories in everything.
sentences.chinese: 哲学的两个概念并代表一切事物的两个对立面。

sentences.english: The opposite of empiricism is rationalism .
sentences.chinese: 经验论的对立面是唯理论。

definition: to oppose/to set sth against/to be antagonistic to/antithetical/relative opposite/opposing/diametrical
position/standpoint/CL:個|个[ge4]
hostile/enemy (factions)/combative
united front
the two cannot exist together (idiom); irreconcilable differences/incompatible standpoints
completely incompatible/lit. incompatible as fire and water
not to get involved/to stay out of it
to adopt confrontational posture/to meet head-on/to compete
to rupture/to burst open/to break/to break off relations with/a rupture
to bare one shoulder/(fig.) to side with/to discriminate in favor of
contradiction/CL:個|个[ge4]/conflicting views/contradictory
to view sb as an enemy/to be hateful towards
internal contradiction
hostile/malevolence/antagonism/to view as enemy/to stand against
spearhead/barb/an attack or criticism
see 撕破臉|撕破脸[si1 po4 lian3]
